thread.title: Evelyn
thread.title_full: David Sklar & Associates Inc. reviewed by Evelyn

author: Evelyn
title: Evelyn
text: Having worked in the same field, I was very pleasantly surprised on the feeling of ease and relief that I experienced when first meeting with Rhoda of David Sklar and Associates. My problem was the main concern and various options were explained to me in a clear concise manner. I was impressed with the feeling of being in a well run office and knowing that I was counted as a person not another number. I would highly recommend this firm to anyone who is looking to sit down and discuss any financial problems and know that you will come out feeling a lot more confident and better at the end of your appointment
